name: Block Clicker
description:
This is a quick and dirty game I decided to put together to help brush up on Unity and figure out some basic video game features that I hadn't yet bothered with, such as keeping track of high scores and volume sliders. 

Gameplay is really simple, all you do is, as the name says, click the boxes as they appear. If three or more boxes are on the screen at any one time the game ends.
